overview: Tony, an aspiring entrepreneur, struggles to pitch his idea. When he gives up and realises that he is a failure, a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity presents itself for him. This involves an urgent meeting with an important investor.  Shortly after, he receives a phone call from his sister that her mother is terminally ill and on the verge of dying. Tony is forced to make a choice. Shall he stay with his mother for what is most likely the last minutes of her life, or shall he pursue the urgent opportunity which is verging on failing if he does not act right away?
title: A Cry for our Future
